rows.label: qst702505_msg0001
rows.name: Adel-sama! Your Majesty...!

rows.label: qst702505_msg0002
rows.name:
We are terribly sorry to have
troubled you this time.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0003
rows.name:
No need to be so formal. I'm just
glad there was no major damage.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0004
rows.name: Right, Hugo?

rows.label: qst702505_msg0005
rows.name:
Yes. You fought well with these
numbers, while protecting those
unaccustomed to battle.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0006
rows.name:
...But we let the enemy
get in so many times...

rows.label: qst702505_msg0007
rows.name:
Noel, Karina, the important thing
on the battlefield is to survive.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0008
rows.name:
You did a fine job. You should
be prouder of yourselves.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0009
rows.name: Adel-sama...!

rows.label: qst702505_msg0010
rows.name:
Adel-sama is my hero. I wish I
had your wisdom and courage...

rows.label: qst702505_msg0011
rows.name:
Then I could help Adel-sama
and everyone, and I'm sure
I could do anything.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0012
rows.name:
Anything, huh... Noel,
you're a brave one.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0013
rows.name:
Don't be ridiculous. It's
presumptuous of someone like you
to try and compete with Adel-sama.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0014
rows.name:
What's wrong with that?
There's no harm in saying it!

rows.label: qst702505_msg0021
rows.name:
Anyway, we were moved by your bravery.
With you all, even Metsu seems like
an easy opponent, Adel-sama!

rows.label: qst702505_msg0022
rows.name:
When the time comes, we'll fight
too, even if it's not much.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0023
rows.name:
We believe you can create a
future where everyone can
live in peace, Adel-sama!

rows.label: qst702505_msg0024
rows.name:
...Thank you. I'll do my best to
bring that day as soon as possible.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0025
rows.name: You look troubled.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0026
rows.name:
I'm happy they trust me, I truly
am. But sometimes I wonder...

rows.label: qst702505_msg0027
rows.name:
Can I really live up to their
expectations and uphold my ideals?

rows.label: qst702505_msg0028
rows.name:
I'm not a god, just a man. I'm reminded
of my powerlessness every day.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0029
rows.name:
We are indeed not gods... but
we are not "just men" either.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0030
rows.name:
Adel, before them, hold your
head high and stand firm.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0031
rows.name:
That is the duty of one
who leads the people.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0032
rows.name: ...You're harsh.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0033
rows.name: But you are absolutely right.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0034
rows.name:
...Royalty really does
carry a heavy burden.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0035
rows.name:
But you don't have to
carry it alone, right?

rows.label: qst702505_msg0036
rows.name:
I don't know the difficult
details, but I think heavy things
should be shared by everyone.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0037
rows.name: Hmph... I see.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0038
rows.name: That's so like you, Laura.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0039
rows.name: I love that about you.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0040
rows.name:
It is not easily done, but we too
always strive to be that way.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0041
rows.name:
To be His Majesty's sword and
to share in his joys and
sorrows, that is our pride.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0042
rows.name: Both of you...

rows.label: qst702505_msg0043
rows.name:
A Driver and Blade are one
and the same, aren't they?

rows.label: qst702505_msg0044
rows.name: So... let me help you too.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0045
rows.name: Ugh...

rows.label: qst702505_msg0046
rows.name: Hey, what's wrong?

rows.label: qst702505_msg0047
rows.name: Are you getting emotional again?

rows.label: qst702505_msg0048
rows.name:
I was just thinking...
how much I love you all.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0049
rows.name: Thank you, truly.
